DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare efficacy tolerability adjuvant exemestane versus adjuvant tamoxifen postmenopausal woman early breast cancer . - Compare relapse-free survival overall survival patient treat drug . - Compare incidence contralateral breast cancer patient treat drug . - Compare safety long-term tolerability drug patient . - Compare quality life patient treat drug . OUTLINE : This randomize , open-label , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord estrogen receptor ( ER ) /progesterone receptor ( PgR ) status ( ER positive v ER negative/PgR positive v ER positive/PgR unknown ) , prior chemotherapy ( none v taxane-based vs anthracycline-based v ) , nodal status ( negative v 1-3 node positive v 4 node positive ) . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive oral tamoxifen daily - Arm II : Patients receive oral exemestane daily . Treatment arm continue minimum 5 year absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Quality life assess baseline month 3 12 study . Patients follow least annually . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 4,400 patient ( 2,200 per treatment arm ) accrue study .
